chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Q: Set
P: Set
V: Set
f: P -> Q
φ: V -> nat
ν: Q -> nat
p: dio_polynomial V P

Goal:
dp_eval φ ν (dp_ren_par p) = dp_eval φ (fun i : P => ν (f i)) p

Premises:
dp_eval : forall V P : Set, (V -> nat) -> (P -> nat) -> dio_polynomial V P -> nat
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
dp_ren_par = fix dp_ren_par (p : dio_polynomial V P) : dio_polynomial V Q := match p with | dp_nat c => dp_nat c | dp_var v => dp_var v | dp_par p0 => dp_par (f p0) | dp_comp o p0 q => dp_comp o (dp_ren_par p0) (dp_ren_par q) end : dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V Q
dp_eval_fix_add : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_add p q) = dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q
dp_eval_fix_mul : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_mul p q) = dp_eval φ ν p * dp_eval φ ν q
dp_eval_ext : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (φ' : V -> nat) (ν' : P -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), (forall v : V, In v (dp_var_list p) -> φ v = φ' v) -> (forall i : P, In i (dp_par_list p) -> ν i = ν' i) -> dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval φ' ν' p
dp_inst_par_eval : forall (V P E : Set) (σ : P -> nat) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : E -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_inst_par E σ p) = dp_eval φ σ p
dio_poly_pos : forall (P : Set) (m : nat) (p : dio_polynomial nat P), (forall x : nat, In x (dp_var_list p) -> x < m) -> {q : dio_polynomial (pos m) P | forall (φ : nat -> nat) (ν : P -> nat), dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval (vec_pos (fun2vec 0 m φ)) ν q}
dio_elem_single : forall l : list dio_constraint, {E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν φ : nat -> nat, dp_eval φ ν (fst E) = dp_eval φ ν (snd E) <-> Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l)}
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
dio_single_pred : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P -> (P -> nat) -> Prop
dp_inst_par : forall V P E : Set, (P -> nat) -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V E
dp_size : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> nat
dio_single = fun V P : Set => (dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P)%type : Set -> Set -> Set Arguments dio_single (_ _)%type_scope
dio_poly_eq_pos_equiv : forall (P : Set) (n : nat) (p q : dio_polynomial (pos n) P) (ν : P -> nat), dio_single_pred (p, q) ν < -> (exists w : vec nat n, dp_eval (vec_pos w) ν p = dp_eval (vec_pos w) ν q)
dp_var_list : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> list V
dp_par_list : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> list P
ZifyClasses.rew_iff : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
convex_n_eq : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => 2 * (f i * g i)) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * f i + g i * g i) < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i)
Forall_forall_map : forall (X : Type) (f : nat -> X) (n : nat) (l : list X) (P : X -> Prop), l = map f (list_an 0 n) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> P (f i)) < -> Forall P l
dc_eval = fun (φ ν : nat -> nat) (c : dio_constraint) => φ (fst c) = dee_eval φ ν (snd c) : (nat -> nat) -> (nat -> nat) -> dio_constraint -> Prop Arguments dc_eval (_ _)%function_scope
dio_fun_ren : forall (t : (nat -> nat) -> nat) (f : nat -> nat), 𝔻F t -> 𝔻F (fun ν : nat -> nat => t (fun n : nat => ν (f n)))
dio_single_size : forall V P : Set, dio_single V P -> nat
dee_eval = fun (φ ν : nat -> nat) (e : dio_elem_expr) => match e with | dee_nat n => n | dee_var v => φ v | dee_par i => ν i | dee_comp o v w => de_op_sem o (φ v) (φ w) end : (nat -> nat) -> (nat -> nat) -> dio_elem_expr -> nat Arguments dee_eval (_ _)%function_scope
dio_fun_compose : forall f : (nat -> nat) -> nat, 𝔻F f -> forall g : nat -> nat, 𝔻F (fun ν : nat -> nat => g (ν 0)) -> 𝔻F (fun ν : nat -> nat => g (f ν))
dio_polynomial_rect : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Type), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_ind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_rec : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Set), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_sind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_fun = fun t : (nat -> nat) -> nat => 𝔻R (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν 0 = t ν⭳) : ((nat -> nat) -> nat) -> Set Arguments dio_fun _%function_scope
dio_rel_fun : forall (x : nat) (t : (nat -> nat) -> nat), 𝔻F t -> 𝔻R (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν x = t ν)
dio_rel_exst : forall K : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop, 𝔻R (fun ν : nat -> nat => K (ν 0) ν⭳) -> 𝔻R (fun ν : nat -> nat => exists x : nat, K x ν)
dio_rel_add : forall x y z : nat, 𝔻R (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν x = ν y + ν z)
dio_rel_add_sym : forall x y z : nat, 𝔻R (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν y + ν z = ν x)
dio_poly_eq_pos : forall (P : Set) (e : dio_single nat P), {m : nat & {p' : dio_polynomial (pos m) P & {q' : dio_polynomial (pos m) P | forall ν : P -> nat, dio_single_pred e ν < -> dio_single_pred (p', q') ν}}}
dio_elem_equation : forall l : list dio_constraint, {E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν : nat -> nat, dio_single_pred E ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l))}
Record dio_repr_at (R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a n l : nat) : Set := Build_dio_repr_at { ds_eqns : list dio_constraint; ds_ref : nat; ds_H0 : length ds_eqns = l; ds_H1 : forall (x : nat) (c : dio_constraint), In c ds_eqns -> dc_vars c x -> a <= x < a + n; ds_H2 : a <= ds_ref < a + n; ds_H3 : forall ν : nat -> nat, exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns; ds_H4 : forall ν : nat -> nat, R ν < -> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns /\ φ ds_ref = 0) } Arguments dio_repr_at _%function_scope (_ _ _)%nat_scope Arguments Build_dio_repr_at _%function_scope [a]%nat_scope _%nat_scope [l]%nat_scope [ds_eqns]%list_scope [ds_ref]%nat_scope _ _%function_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope
dio_rel_conj : forall R S : (nat -> nat) -> Prop, 𝔻R R -> 𝔻R S -> 𝔻R (fun ν : nat -> nat => R ν /\ S ν)
dio_formula_elem : forall f : dio_formula, {l : list dio_constraint | length l <= 1 + 7 * df_size f /\ (forall (c : dio_constraint) (x : nat), In c l -> dc_vars c x -> x < 8 * df_size f) /\ (forall ν : nat -> nat, df_pred f ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l))}
dio_rel = fun R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop => {f : dio_formula | forall ν : nat -> nat, df_pred f ν < -> R ν} : ((nat -> nat) -> Prop) -> Set Arguments dio_rel _%function_scope
df_pred = fix df_pred (f : dio_formula) (ν : nat -> nat) {struct f} : Prop := match f with | df_cst x n => ν x = n | df_eq x y => ν x = ν y | df_op o x y z => ν x = de_op_sem o (ν y) (ν z) | df_bin o f0 g => df_op_sem o (df_pred f0 ν) (df_pred g ν) | ∃ f0 => exists n : nat, df_pred f0 n·ν end : dio_formula -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments df_pred _ _%function_scope
vec_pos_fun2vec : forall (X : Type) (i n : nat) (f : nat -> X) (p : pos n), vec_pos (fun2vec i n f) p = f (i + pos2nat p)
dio_rel_equiv : forall R S : (nat -> nat) -> Prop, (forall ν : nat -> nat, S ν <-> R ν) -> 𝔻R R -> 𝔻R S

``` 
intros.
unfold dp_ren_par.
induction p.
- reflexivity.
- reflexivity.
- simpl.
  rewrite IHp.
  reflexivity.
- simpl.
  rewrite IHp1.
  rewrite IHp2.
  reflexivity.
```
